Review Text: Ordered a milkshake thru ZOMATO and the Milkshakes tastes bad and they do also have some plastic papers inside. Very much disappointed with them.

Visited this place more than couple of times, except kitkat shake and brownie shake nothing seems good over here. I would rather prefer thickshake factory or a thickshake from creamstone. One time visit place that's it..
I ordered Belgium dark chocolates thickshake .. but quality was not upto the mark ... Quality was very poor and thickness also very less ... We need to improve more ....

It's not a milkshake, it's an extremelyyyy thick shake and you'll have to eat like an ice cream!!!
Ordered 2 shakes - caramel 5-star and oreo Nutella.
Both of them tasted good and surprisingly tasted the same as well!! ğŸ™„
The caramel used was soft and not crunchy.
Suggest you to improvise on the texture and the proportions of the ingredients...
Also, there were a hell lot of mosquitoes, please maintain hygiene!!

Extremely poor service. Ignorant and neglected behavior towards customers. The bill of an order is the most basic item in any retail purchase/transaction. Unfortunately Milkshake Buffin, Staff, Management do not care about customers. No bill provided even after repeated requests. The owner over the phone blatantly refused and said "we do not give the invoice to the customer as we have not got the required regulations in place and they are under process" I was promised verbally over the phone that the bill would be emailed next morning. However, this never happened. How is this for treatment towards the customer?
Ordered online from this place. Their packaging brought a smile to our faces. The milkshakes were also tasty, but the 5 stars to presentation :)

In terms of taste, it is good and it more tastes like thickshake.Â

One of the best thick shakes in the city....Belgium shake being extraordinary must try....Ferrero rocher..mango next to best shakes...staff friendly

Best place to have good milkshakes.. my pick is the Ferro Rocher Milkshake.
Reasonably priced and value for money! Must try for their signature milkshakes
late delivery.All the milkshakes were of almost same taste.Nothing varied but the prices did.

Ordered Mango milkshake and KitKat milkshakes. It's really taste and good quality with Quantity and good packaging also. Really nice. Keep it up MILKSHAKE BUFFIN.

A must try if youÂ  are around this place, to make a note this is very near to ORR and you can quickly grab and vanish into the long drives.Â  Strawberry Banana is my all time favourite. The staff is very pleasant and i am glad that I found this one near to my home. Highly recommended.
Lovely place..good quality milkshakes. Good ambiance. Peaceful place.. Good quality chocolates. I hit the place around 5 times.. Everytime I had one type of milkshake. Banana milkshake made my day..

Very good place to have thick milkshakes.....taste is excellent..ambience is decent...I will surely recommend everybody to go and have some nice thick shakes..Oreo Nutella is very nice.

Milkshake quantity is good. Delivery was quick. Milkshake was thicker than expected. Add ons are great. I would have given a 5 if the chocolate quantity is increased for the same price... Feels more like a vanilla shake than chocolate

Tried Chocolate Brownie which tasted really good. Located in the Financial district, jus 2 mins drive from Wipro circle. Grab a milkshake of your choice on your way back home.
